en.header: True or false? A service adviser is just an intermediary, not the face of the organisation.
en.klf: This is false! To the customer, as a service engineer, you are the organisation. This is why you must support it and be proud of your products and solutions.
en.tips: Offering good service usually means more than simply solving a customer’s issue. Make a difference by always trying to go the extra mile.

fr.header: Vrai ou faux ? Un conseiller de service n'est qu'un intermédiaire, pas le visage de l'entreprise.
fr.klf: C'est faux ! Pour le client, en tant que technicien de maintenance, vous êtes l'entreprise. C'est pourquoi vous devez le soutenir et être fier de vos produits et de vos solutions.
fr.tips: Offrir un bon service signifie généralement plus que simplement résoudre le problème d'un client. Faites la différence en essayant toujours de faire un effort supplémentaire.

de.header: True or false? A service adviser is just an intermediary, not the face of the organisation.
de.klf: This is false! To the customer, as a service engineer, you are the organisation. This is why you must support it and be proud of your products and solutions.
de.tips: Offering good service usually means more than simply solving a customer’s issue. Make a difference by always trying to go the extra mile.
